newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-BHP AIMS FOR BETTER RETURN ON EQUITY.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-BHP AIMS FOR BETTER RETURN ON EQUITY.

text.p: Australia's largest listest company, The Broken Hill Pty Co Ltd, said on Friday that the board's targets included increased return on equity and reducing debt.
"The targets are to do with increasing return on equity by a certain date," BHP Chairman Jerry Ellis told a news conference.
Ellis said the target would be staged within two time frames, the first to see an improvement within two years and the second to see another improvement within the five year following that.
He said the board also wanted to see BHP debt levels reduced.
